highlights.description: WASM and Docker sandboxing for secure tool execution

added.description: `skills/` package with SKILL.md parser supporting YAML frontmatter and metadata
Skill discovery from multiple directories with deduplication
Requirement checking for skills (bins, env vars) with install hints
Skill injection into system prompt with emoji support
CLI commands: `skills list`, `skills info`, `skills check`
Agent integration with skill loading on startup
`sandbox/` package with capability-based permission model
WASM runtime wrapper using wazero with memory limits and timeout enforcement
Host functions for sandboxed file, HTTP, and command execution
Docker sandbox with container isolation and security hardening
Path validation with symlink resolution for sandbox security
Command allowlist enforcement for exec operations

fixed.description: Config tests now clear environment variables to prevent interference

dependencies.description: Add `github.com/moby/moby/api` v1.53.0 for Docker API types

highlights.description: Voice note support via OmniVoice integration for WhatsApp

added.description: `voice/` package with `Processor` implementing omnichat's `VoiceProcessor` interface
Voice configuration in `config.go` with STT/TTS provider settings
Environment variable support for voice config (`DEEPGRAM_API_KEY`, `OMNIAGENT_VOICE_*`)
Gateway integration with `ProcessWithVoice` handler for voice-enabled messaging
Deepgram provider support for both STT (nova-2) and TTS (aura-asteria-en)
Response mode options: `auto` (voice reply to voice input), `always`, `never`

highlights.description: Initial release with WebSocket gateway, AI agent runtime, and unified messaging via omnichat

added.description: WebSocket gateway with client management and health checks
AI agent runtime with omnillm multi-provider support (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini)
Unified messaging via omnichat (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord)
WhatsApp provider with QR code linking
LLM observability integration via omniobserve
Tool execution loop with max 5 iterations
Web search tool via omniserp
Browser automation tool using Rod
Shell execution tool with allowlist security
Cobra-based CLI with gateway, channels, config, and version commands
YAML/JSON configuration with environment variable overrides
CI/CD pipeline with multi-platform testing
